name: canvas-chat
description: A visual, non-linear chat interface where conversations are nodes on an infinite canvas

scripts.test: node tests/test_utils.js && node tests/test_search.js && node tests/test_ui.js

_comment: test script duplicates pyproject.toml test-js task - both must be kept in sync. package.json is for npm users, pyproject.toml is for pixi users.
